name: johnsgame
description: You will burn the world down, break every bone, slaughter every child, and find his truth. Do you want to know what happens in the end? John dies. Everyone dies in the end, it's just the hard truth. I am speaking to you, I just wish you would listen.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Intel® Core™ i7 Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256 Intel(R) HD Graphics Family Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
